item.description:
Take a break from all that pre-Christmas stress. Even if it's for a short while. Please join us for a little bit of Cheer! Come have a Cocktail and possibly an Appetizer!

Sam Diegos has a fun and relaxing atmosphere. Offering a full menu of delicious award-winning Mexican & Tex-Mex selections, Southwestern Specialties, Bar-be-Que and various Salads, SAMwiches & SAMburgers.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the first bar near the entrance. I'll be wearing my Girl's just Wanna Have Fun Pin!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Pre-Christmas Cocktails at Sam Diego's in Hyannis
